title: Cellular Test Engineer
summary: Apple is one of the world’s most successful businesses. We are primarily a consumer electronics business producing hardware (iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, AirPods, Apple TV), software (iOS, MacOS, Safari) and services (Apple Music, App Store, iCloud, News+ and Apple TV+). Over 1.4 billion of our devices are currently in use across the world, whilst Apple Music has over 60 million subscribers globally We care about what we do, and believe Apple is a force for good. Apple is a company full of exciting ideas and innovative people, who are also committed to upholding the highest moral, legal and ethical standards in everything we do. We believe technology can serve humankind's deepest values and highest aspirations. Protecting individuals’ privacy, promoting diversity and inclusivity, providing products that educate, and are accessible to all needs, are fundamentals within our business.
description: WTE Product System Test team is looking for a motivated, highly-technical Cellular Product System Test Engineer with excellent problem solving and communication skills. You will join a dynamic team responsible for qualifying the latest iPhone/iPad/Watch. Your focus will be testing the Baseband & Telephony features in Apple’s innovative new products. The successful candidate will complete the functional testing and identify cellular issues to ensure high quality releases.
preferred_qualifications:
Proactive to tackle various issues by creative thinking, keep improving test efficiency by tool development
Experience with eNB/gNB or network simulation is a big plus
Coding & Automation scripting skill is a big plus
Excellent communication & interpersonal skills, both in Chinese & English
education_experience: EE degree, CS degree or equivalent
